workflow.name: Create & publish affiliate product videos with Sora-2, GPT & YouTube
workflow.description:
# üöÄ Affiliate AI-Powered Video Funnel Fully Automated Product Video Creation & Publishing

**Turn your affiliate links or product catalog into a 24/7 AI video marketing machine.**
This n8n workflow auto-creates human-presenter promo videos using AI and publishes them directly to YouTube with SEO ‚Äî completely hands-free. ‚úÖ

---

## üéØ What This Automation Does

* üîÑ **Fetches product or affiliate data** from Google Sheets / Airtable / Database
* üéôÔ∏è **Generates human-presenter video prompts** (Sora-style) using AI Agents
* üé¨ **Renders promotional videos automatically** via AI video generation
* ‚è≥ **Polls render completion** & handles errors safely
* üì§ **Uploads videos to YouTube** (draft, unlisted, or public)
* üß† **Auto-generates SEO metadata** (titles, descriptions, tags, hashtags)
* ‚úÖ **Human approval flow** before public publishing
* üìù **Updates catalog status** to prevent duplicates
* ‚è±Ô∏è **Runs daily, weekly, or per request** via form or trigger

This workflow eliminates all repetitive editing, uploading, and SEO work ‚Äî **your channel grows while you sleep**. üò¥üìà

---

## üßë‚Äçüè´ Step-by-Step Video Tutorial

üé• **Complete Implementation Demo**
üëâ [https://youtu.be/pOxcVbYdr0w](https://youtu.be/pOxcVbYdr0w)

üìå Covers full setup, rendering, approval, publishing, and automation scheduling.

---

## üåê Useful Links

* üõ†Ô∏è n8n Hosting / Setup Support: [https://syncbricks.com](https://syncbricks.com)
* üìö YouTube Data API Docs: [https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3](https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3)
* ü§ñ Kai / AI Render Service: *(any Sora-style provider you choose)*
* üß† AI Prompt Docs (OpenAI etc.): [https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference](https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference)

---

## üõ† Prerequisites

* ‚úÖ n8n (Self-Hosted or Cloud)
* ‚úÖ AI Agent inside n8n configured
* ‚úÖ YouTube API credentials
* ‚úÖ Product/Affiliate data source:

  * Google Sheets OR Airtable OR Database
* ‚úÖ AI Video Rendering: Sora-style provider API

üìù Recommended product fields:

> Title, Summary, Brand, Landing Page, Affiliate Link (if using monetization)

---

## üìã How This Workflow Works ‚Äî Step by Step

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Product Input & Filtering

* Fetch unpublished product/item
* Skip rows marked ‚ÄúPublished‚Äù or with error codes
* Ideal for **drip publishing** content every day

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ AI Promo Script + Presenter Prompt

* Converts product benefits ‚Üí human script
* Adds overlays + camera movement + style cues
* Presenter looks professional, friendly & trusted

### 3Ô∏è‚É£ AI Video Rendering

* Send prompt, wait for result
* Retry & timeout safety built-in

### 4Ô∏è‚É£ YouTube Upload

* Uploads automatically as **Unlisted**
* ‚úÖ Sends Human-In-The-Loop (HITL) approval
* After approval ‚Üí **Public Publish**

### 5Ô∏è‚É£ SEO Enhancement

* Generates tags, hashtags & optimized titles
* Inserts affiliate link into description
* Updates video via YouTube API

### 6Ô∏è‚É£ Mark As Published

* Saves record in sheet/db
* Avoids duplicate publishing

---

## üí∞ Affiliate / Monetization Features

* üõí Add PartnerStack / Amazon Associates links
* üîó Auto-insert affiliate URLs per product
* üß© Optional dynamic UTM tracking
* üìà Ready for performance dashboards (CTR, views)

You create **zero videos**, yet grow **daily affiliate revenue**. üî•

---

## üí° Advanced Customizations

| Idea                            | Benefit                         |
| ------------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| Multi-platform publishing       | Expand reach beyond YouTube     |
| Multi-language voice & captions | Increase global audience        |
| Category-based styles           | Better storytelling per product |
| Bulk overnight generation       | Boost weekly content output     |
| Analytics integration           | Track growth & ROI easily       |

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Troubleshooting

| Issue             | Fix                            |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------ |
| No video returned | Check AI render provider quota |
| Upload fails      | Verify YouTube OAuth scopes    |
| Duplicate uploads | Confirm Published tag update   |
| Video quality     | Adjust prompt style profile    |

---

## üôå Why This Template

You can scale affiliate & product-based video content **without editing tools**, **creators**, or **extra headcount**:

‚úÖ Saves hours per video
‚úÖ Builds traffic and trust automatically
‚úÖ Generates recurring affiliate income
‚úÖ Turns your product list into a money-making content engine

---

## üöÄ Get Started in Minutes

Import the workflow ‚Üí Connect APIs ‚Üí Approve ‚Üí Publish ‚Üí Earn üí∏

üëâ More AI + n8n Workflows & Support
[https://syncbricks.com](https://syncbricks.com)

üëâ Subscribe for Tutorials
[https://youtube.com/@syncbricks](https://youtube.com/@syncbricks)

üëâ Connect with the creator (Amjid Ali)
[https://linkedin.com/in/amjidali](https://linkedin.com/in/amjidali)

---

### üîñ Knowledge Base Tags

`ai_video_automation`, `affiliate_marketing`, `youtube_api`, `handsfree_automation`, `ecommerce_video_marketing`, `n8n_ai_agents`, `social_video_automation`, `product_video_generator`, `workflow_automation`, `marketing_scaling`

user.bio:
I specialise in transforming enterprises into AI-driven, insight-powered ecosystems by combining Agentic AI, Business Intelligence, and workflow automation to unlock performance, efficiency, and strategic growth.

Key Expertise:
‚Äì Agentic AI Systems & Autonomous Agents
‚Äì Workflow & Business Process Automation (n8n, low-code)
‚Äì RAG Pipelines & LLM Integrations
‚Äì Business Intelligence (Power BI, Azure)
‚Äì Financial Reporting & Performance Analytics
‚Äì AI Governance, Data Strategy & Responsible AI

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
